policy.name: AWS ELB - Surge Queue Utilization Above 50%
policy.description: The ELB surge queue holds requests until they can be forwarded to the backend servers. The surge queue can hold a maximum of 1,024 requests, after which it will be full and will start rejecting requests. Netuitive's Surge Queue Utilization metric reflects as a percentage how full the surge queue currently is. If the surge queue is more than 50% full for 15 minutes or longer, a Critical event is generated.
